hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Having trouble breathing underwater?^Have you tried wearing more BLUE?

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Iron Boots#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Heart Container# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Wallet# and #the Lens of Truth#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Iron Boots#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Farore's Wind#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Okami is the best Zelda game.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Water Temple#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Kokiri Sword#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Spirit Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Lens of Truth#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Level Island Courtyard

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Kokiri Sword#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #4# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Recovery Heart#.
